mapper.select: select nbi.id, nbi.name, nbi.total_supply, nbi.image_url, nbi.price, nbi.inventory, nbi.lanuch_status, a.author_name, a.avatar_url from pm_nft_batch_info as nbi, pm_author as a where nbi.author_id = a.author_id and nbi.is_open = 1 and nbi.lanuch_status != 0 order by nbi.issue_time desc limit #{start}, #{limit}

select a.author_name, a.avatar_url, a.author_desc, nbi.id, nbi.contract_address, nbi.name, nbi.image_url, nbi.description, nbi.tx_hash, nbi.price, nbi.issue_time as "start_time", nbi.total_supply from pm_nft_batch_info as nbi, pm_author as a where nbi.author_id = a.author_id and nbi.id = #{id} and nbi.lanuch_status != 0
